page.title: 08St. John's Cadets, Bridgham
page.content:
Started 15 years ago, to provide the young people in the village with a worthwhile and helpful outlet for their energies, St. John's Ambulance Cadets now cater for 30 children (7-16) and 5 adults.
In any one year, there are 3 training programmes, covering a wide range of aspects, from home nursing to nature studies. Also, there are annual County camps and this year, members from this division attended. In competitions, Bridgham has gained a reputation envied by many, for we do very well at both County and Open levels. However, Cadets also serve in wider areas _ e.g. litter collecting and carol singing in the village and undertaking duties at various local functions, such as charity fetes.
